pages.text: In Cuisine Mod, these fruit trees are the only way to get citrus fruits.$(br2)You can pick matured fruits via right-clicking. Alternatively, fruits may automatially fall onto ground if it hasn't been picked up.$(br2)Generally speaking, a single fruit tree will stop fruiting after it produces around 80 fruits (exclude those being

manually picked). $(br2)Leaves that are harvested by shears will NOT fruit again after placed back in world, but you can use bonemeal or other sorts to make it flower.$(br2)$(em)Citrus Wood$() is also a good construction block.
